Ella considera que hasta el momento ha tenido ingresos que le permiten hacerse cargo de los gastos del hogar y eso la ha motivado seguir adelante con su negocio al cual le dedica 4 horas diarias.
Ella ha obtenido ya tres prestamos con ODEF que le han ayudado a mantener su negocio y también ha podido hacerle mejoras a sus vivienda. En la actualidad solicita sus cuarto préstamo de 5,000 lempiras para comprar mas mercadería como ser (ropa interior, calcetas, toallas, manteles de cocina).
Su meta es seguir invirtiendo en su negocio para obtener mas ingresos y suplir otras necesidades que se le presenten en el futuro.
texts.en:
Evangelina is 65 years old, and she is a single mother.  She has two children, ages 42 and 26.  She lives with them in the La Esperanza village in Tela, Atlántida.

For fifteen years she has had a business of selling clothes where she sells underwear, socks, towels, tablecloths, and fabric for curtains.  She started this business activity with capital that her sister gave her.  She recognizes that, so far, she has had income that has allowed her to take charge of the household expenses.  This has motivated her to get ahead with her business, in which she devotes four hours daily.

She has received three loans from ODEF, and they have helped her maintain her business.  She has also been able to improve her home.  She is currently requesting her fourth loan for 5,000 lempiras in order to buy more merchandise like underwear, socks, towels, and tablecloths.

Her goal is to continue investing in her business in order to get more income and to provide for future needs.

loans.use: to buy underwear, socks, towels, and tablecloths to sell.

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en: Sergia is 56 years old, married and has one adult child.  She is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines.  Sergia used her last loan to purchase products to sell in her retail store.  Her business is successful, and she's taking a new loan to purchase new items and expand her product offering. In the future she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase new items for her retail store.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru:
Гульмире  27 лет, замужем.  Вместе с мужем воспитывают двоих детей, младшей дочери три года.  
 Основная деятельность семьи Гульмиры – это откорм и перепродажа скота и полеводство.  Начатое с покупки одного теленка в 10,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство сегодня приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов.   В данный момент, семья Гульмиры обрабатывает  2,70 га орошаемой земли, где выращивают пшеницу.  В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Гульмира обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку селитры и удобрения для обработки земли для посева. Доходы от кредита Гульмира планирует вложить покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить свое хозяйство.
texts.en: Gulmira is 27 years old, married.  Her husband and she are raising two children, and their youngest daughter is three years old.  Gulmira's family's primary business is fattening up and reselling livestock and farming.  The business, started with a purchase of one calf with 10,000 som (KGS), currently yields about 15,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and milk products.  Currently, the family works on 2.70 hectares of irrigated land, where they grow wheat.  In order to further increase livestock headcount, Gulmira requested a loan in the sum of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy saltpetre and fertilizers for treating the land for sowing.  Gulmira plans to invest the profits from the loan into a purchase of dairy cows, which would allow her to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase saltpetre and fertilizers

loans.name: Abduhomid

texts.ru: Абдухомид проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 39 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Абдухомид имеет среднее образование. Он покупает и продает рыбу, он занимается торговлей рыбы. В этой области он десять лет. Кредит берет для приобретения автомашины, чтобы привозить товар самому на своем автомобиле.
texts.en: Abduhomid lives in the city of Isfara. He is 39 years old, married, and has five children. Abduhomid has secondary education. He is a fishmonger, and has been buying and reselling fish for ten years. Abduhomid is taking this loan to purchase a vehicle that he will use to transport his products.

loans.use: to purchase a vehicle for his business

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.ru: Одилчон житель города Истаравшан. Возраст, 30 лет. Женат, имеет двоих детей. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов бычков и коз.
texts.en: Odiljon is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is 30 years old, married and has two children.  He earns a living by breeding cattle.  Odiljon has been involved in this business for five years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase several heads of bulls and goats.

loans.use: to buy several heads of bulls and goats

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is a married woman. She has one child who is enrolled in school. Francisca operates a food stall business and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for seven years. Her primary customers are neighbours and passersby. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expense is school fees and food. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Francisca will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase cooking oil, wheat flour, maize flour, vegetables and beans. Francisca aspires to establish a restaurant business in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, wheat flour, maize flour, vegetables and beans.

loans.name: Naise

texts.es:
Naise de 20 años es una joven soltera. Vive con sus padres y hermanos en una casa propia en el Barrio de Cayán, distrito de Huasahuasi, provincia de Tarma. Ella ayuda a sus padres en las labores agrícolas. Desde sus 15 años, destina gran parte de su tiempo a trabajar la tierra. Naise es una chica de buenas iniciativas y de espíritu emprendedor, por eso, ella impulsa y apoya a sus padres a invertir en el campo. Su familia se dedica a la producción de papas, arvejas, habas y maíz. Es así que sus padres y hermanos mayores labran la tierra, y ella se encarga de preparar los alimentos que traslada hasta sus sembríos.
Le gusta ser parte de la negociación de las cosechas, por eso, cada vez que sus padres llevan sus productos hasta el mercado mayorista de Tarma, ella va con ellos, desde muy temprano.
Las papas son las más solicitadas, ya que su distrito, Huasahuasi, es considerada como capital semillera del país, y los compradores dan preferencia a los tubérculos del lugar.
Con el tiempo, Naise espera adquirir mas terrenos de cultivos, y al mismo tiempo cursa estudios técnicos en un instituto de la ciudad. Éste sería su préstamo número 5 que obtendría de MFP, por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y haciendo honor a su nombre, los miembros trabajan coordinadamente para conseguir sus metas.
Invertirá el dinero en la compra de bolsas de abonos orgánicos y sacos de guano de corral para sus sembríos de papa. Cada bolsa de abono cuesta 120 soles y cada saco de guano está a 5 soles.
texts.en:
Naise, 20 years old, is a young single woman. She lives with her parents and siblings in their own home in the small town of Cayán, Huasahuasi district, Tarma provine. She helps her parents in their agricultural work. 

Since she was 15, she has dedicated a large part of her time to working on the land. Naise is a girl with good iniciative and an entrepreneurial spirit, this is why she encourages and helps her parents to invest in the land. Her family produces potatoes, peas, beans and corn. While her parents and older siblings work the land, she is in charge of preparing the foods that they transport to the sown fields.

She likes being part of the crop sales negotiation, this why, since very early on, every time her parents take their products to the wholesale market in Tarma, she goes with them.

The potatoes are their most requested product, since their district, Huasahuasi, is considered as the growing capital of the country so the purchasers give preference to local potatoes.

In time, Naise hopes to acquire more land to cultivate and at the same time to take courses in technical studies at the high school in the city.

This will be the 5th loan that she will obtain from MFP, and she promises to be punctual in paying her monthly payments. She belongs to the communal bank "Siempre Juntos" ("Always together") and, doing justice to its name, the members always work together to achieve their goals.

She will invest the money buying to bags of organic manure and sacks of animal dung for her parents sown fields. Each bag of manure costs 120PEN and each sack of dung is 5PEN.

loans.use: Comprar bolsas de abono y sacos de guano de ave de corral.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reyna Isabel tiene 39 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 12 años de edad, los cuales están estudiando, vive en la Aldea La Esperanza, Tela.
Reyna hace dos años que estableció su propio negocio de pulpería para vender productos alimenticios como arroz, frijoles, harina, manteca, huevos, refrescos, embutidos, condimentos etc. anteriormente trabajaba en un hospital como enfermera pero los ingresos no eran suficientes y por eso decidió este negocio. Atiende bien a sus clientes tiene abierto 15 horas diarias todos los días.
Ha mantenido surtido desde que empezó a solicitar préstamos y ha logrado ingresos que le permiten apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios. Actualmente está solicitando el séptimo préstamo y lo va invertir en el negocio para surtir de granos básicos, embutidos, refrescos y ropa para vender.
Su meta es iniciar con el negocio de ropa y poder generar otros ingresos para apoyar económicamente al hogar.
texts.en:
Reyna Isabel, age 39, is married and has two children.  The children are 5 and 12, and they go to school.  She lives in the La Esperanza village in Tela.

Two years ago Reyna established her own business, which is a grocery store selling food products like rice, beans, flour, lard, eggs, soft drinks, sausages, and condiments, etc.  She previously worked as a nurse in a hospital, but she did not get enough income.  Therefore, she decided on this business.  She tends to her customers well, and the store is open 15 hours a day every day.

She has kept the store stocked since she started to request loans.  She has obtained income that allows her to support her children’s education.  She is currently requesting her seventh loan.  She will use it to stock her business with basic grains, sausages, soft drinks, and clothes to sell.

Her goal is to start a clothing business and to be able to generate other income to financially support her household.

loans.use: to stock her business with products like basic grains, lard, sausages, flour, and eggs, etc.  She will use the other part to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Josefa Benita

texts.es:
Josefa se dedica a la docencia desde hace muchos años, experiencia que tiene en la enseñanza a los niños de primaria lo que le da gran satisfacción porque está aportando un granito de arena al desarrollo de nuestro país.

Es madre soltera con una hija que la está preparando profesionalmente, como persona de bien y luchadora como ella.
Como madre abnegada y responsable piensa en el futuro para su hija por lo que está solicitando un crédito para pagar todos los gastos universitarios de todo un año para que esto no sea obstáculo para que culmine su carrera, ya que es lo más importante que esta madre le puede dejar a su hija.

Confía en Dios  que Ceprodel le podrá brindar su mano para lograr su objetivo, ya que con su pequeño salario no puede cubrir estos costos porque es la única que apoya a su querida hija.
texts.en:
Josefa has been working as a teacher for many years.  She has a lot of experience teaching elementary school children which gives her great satisfaction because she is doing her small bit towards our country's development.

Josefa is a single mother and she has a daughter who is training professionally to become an upstanding and tenacious person like her mother.

As a selfless and responsible mother, Josefa is thinking about her daughter's future and is requesting a loan to cover all her university expenses for a whole year so that it is not an obstacle to her finishing her degree because it is the most important inheritance that this mother can leave her daughter.

Josefa trusts in God that Ceprodel will be able to give her a hand in achieving her aim.  She cannot cover these costs on her low salary because she is the only one who supports her much-loved daughter.

loans.use: to cover her daughter's university expenses

loans.name: Nickson

texts.en:
Nickson is 27 years old and married with no children yet. He sells maize in a business he started three years ago. He earns a monthly income of 10,000 Kenya shillings (KES). 

Nickson wants to purchase more bags of maize and therefore requests a loan of KES 50,000. The profit he makes from his businesses will help him repay his loan and expand his business.

His dream is to see his business grow big and be able to meet the needs of his family. This is his third loan. He paid his previous loans well and in good time.

loans.use: To purchase more bags of maize for sale.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
Basilia, de 55 años de edad, está casada con Félix de 60 años, fruto de esta relación tienen una hija. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Llochegua.
Basilia, es una mujer llena de experiencia en los negocio, pues tiene 3 décadas dedicándose a un restaurante y  jugueria, siendo ambos negocios los más concurridos dentro de su zona. Cuenta que para llegar al lugar donde está le costo mucho sacrificio y dedicación, además de paciencia y el trato que ofrece a su clientela. Basilia está contenta con su negocio, por que le es muy rentable gracias a ello pudo darles una buena educación a su hija, el único percance que basilia tiene es el desabastecimiento de verduras frescas en la zona. En un futuro basilia está pensando abrir una fuente de soda. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles comprará más mercadería para su restaurante.
texts.en:
Basilia, 55, is married to Felix, 60, and they have a daughter. They live in their own home located in Llochegua District.

Basilia is a woman with a lot of business experience since she has had a restaurant and a juice bar and both business have been the most heavily patronized in the area. She notes that in order to reach this point she had to make many sacrifices, work hard, have patience and provide good service to her customers. Basilia is pleased with her business because it is very profitable. Thanks to her success she has been able to give her child a good education. The only problem she has is the shortage of fresh vegetables in the area.

In the future, Basilia is thinking of opening a soda fountain. This is her first loan with MFP and she promises to make her payments on time. With the 1000 nuevos soles she will buy more merchandise for her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy more products such as vegetables, meat and canned goods in order to prepare more food.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis de 60 años de edad, está casado con Dominica de 53 años fruto de esta relación tienen 4 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en la comunidad de Periavente alta del distrito de Llochegua. Luis es un hombre que dedico casi toda su vida en la agricultura, cuenta que cuando una vez casado con su esposa su padre le heredó una parcela agrícola con cultivos de café y cacao, fue él quien continuo sembrando hasta la actualidad. Agradece bastante a su adorada esposa quien siempre estuvo junto con él apoyándolo en todo.
Luis trabaja ahora con su hijo mayor, quien es casi su mano derecha y está a cargo de los trabajos en el cultivo de café, pero en los días de cosecha cuenta siempre con el apoyo de peones quienes le facilitan en la recolección de los frutos. En adelante está pensando abrir una tienda de venta de verduras en un mercado, ya que hace un par de años accedió a uno. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete por segunda vez en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,000 nuevos realizará la limpieza de la maleza de su parcela agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Luis, 60, is married to Dominica, 53, and they have four children from this relationship.  Together they live in their own house located in the community of Periavente Alta in the district of Llochegua.  Luis is a man who dedicated his whole life to agriculture.  He says that, as soon as he was married to his wife, his father left him a plot of farmland with coffee and cacao crops.  It was he who continued planting up to the present.  He is very grateful to his adored wife who always was at his side helping him in everything.

Luis now works with his oldest son, who is practically his right hand and is in charge of the coffee-growing jobs.  On harvest days Luis always counts on the help of farmworkers who help him harvest the fruit.  Later he is planning to open a store for selling vegetables in the market of his district, because a couple of years ago he got a stall there.

This will be his second loan with MFP, for which he promises for the second time to make his payments punctually.

With the 2,000 PEN he will clear the weeds from his plot of farmland, for which he will hire farmworkers.

loans.use: to hire farmworkers.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita  is a seamstress. She also cooks rice porridge for sale and serves her porridge with meat pies. She lives in Krofofodo near Abura. She has done this for twenty years now. Anita is married with five dependents. Her husband is a mason. She uses her income to assist her husband to pay their children’s school fees. 

Anita needs this loan to purchase bags of rice for her porridge and flour for her meat pies. She also needs money to buy fabric and other sewing materials to aid in her sewing work. With the new profit, Anita will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of rice, flour, fabric and other sewing materials.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a thirty-nine-year-old business lady in living in Kiembeni, Mombasa. She is a married mother of three. She operates a beauty salon, a business she has been running for the past twelve years with success.

This is her first business loan from KADET Ltd. to finance her business. She plans to purchase hair driers, hair rollers, combs and hair tongs. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children. 

She hopes to have an solid business.

loans.use: to purchase hair driers, hair rollers, combs and hair tongs.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam is a 53-year-old married woman. She has five children with ages ranging from 18 years to 26 years. She describes herself to be aggressive and focused. 

She operates a school, where she provides education, and a retail store, where she sells sweaters and school uniforms. She has been involved in this business for 8 years. Her business is located at a busy estate and her primary customers are the estate's residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of thread. 

She will use the loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase more school uniforms and sweaters. Miriam's business dream and hope is to be a big supplier of school uniforms and sweaters within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy school uniforms and sweaters for her retail store.

loans.name: Cristal Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CRISTAL” iniciará su decimo sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora María Martha es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de fruta, venta de cosméticos, venta de gelatinas, venta de ropa, artesanía en tejido, venta de jugos de quinua, tienda de abarrotes, compra de chatarra. 

La señora María Martha indica que hace diez años que integra en Pro Mujer  ingresando por invitación de amigas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de compra de chatarras que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de una empresa de aceros.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el crecimiento de su negocio (compra de chatarras) que adquirirá de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializa en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene nueve hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y capacitación.

En la fotografía podemos ver dos visitantes a la hija de la señora Ines, que esta vestida de color rosado, y el esposo de la señora emiliana, señor de gorra en el centro.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Cristal” will begin its sixteenth loan cycle with Pro Mujer. As part of the Villa Exaltation office, it is made up of eight members and is steered by a group of directors, of which María is the president. The businesses owned by the members of the communal bank are varied. Among them are: fruit sales, cosmetics sales, selling gelatins, clothing sales, woven crafts sales,  selling quinoa juice, a small grocery store, and buying scrap metal.

María Martha says she has been a member of Pro Mujer for ten years. She became involved at the invitation of friends. Now she has a business buying scrap metal, which she has had for several years and which she learned from a steel business. 

The loan she will now take is for the growth of her business, buying scrap metal that she will get in El Alto and then sell from her business place. This type of work allows her to generate income to help support her family; she is married and has nine children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health care and training. 

In the photo we can see two friends of Ines’ daughter, who is wearing pink, and the husband of Emiliana, the gentleman wearing a baseball cap in the center.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Doña Juana tiene 57 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 29,26 y 25 años de edad, vive en la colonia victoria, Choloma, Cortes.
La actividad económica de Doña Juana es la venta de mercadería en general como (Ropa de segunda mano, juguetes, camisas y achinería (talcos, pastas, peines, pañuelos, tazas, peluches, flores etc.). obtuvo hace 3 años este negocio con la ayuda de su hermana que le proporciono parte de los productos y un local para empezar,  logrando salir adelante con mucha dedicación y buena administración ha generado ingresos que le han permitido seguir trabajando. Dedicando 8 horas diarias.
Doña Juana ha tenido 10 préstamos con ODEF, ahora solicita su préstamo número 11 de 15,000 lempiras para poder surtir con mercadería como peluches, tazas decorativas  y flores artificiales.
Su meta es comprar un local en un lugar donde tenga mas demanda de clientes.
texts.en:
Juana, age 57, is a single mother.  She has three children, ages 29, 26, and 25.  She lives in the Victoria neighborhood in Choloma, Cortes.

Juana sells general merchandise like second-hand clothes, toys, shirts, and general merchandise (powder, toothpaste, combs, handkerchiefs, stuffed animals, and flowers, etc.).  She got this business three years ago with the help of her sister, who gave her some of the products and a place to start.

She is managing to get ahead with a lot of dedication and good administration.  She has generated income, which has allowed her to keep working.  She devotes eight hours a day to her work.

Juana has had ten loans with ODEF.  She is now requesting her eleventh loan for 15,000 lempiras in order to be able to stock up with merchandise like stuffed animals, decorative cups, and artificial flowers.

Her goal is to buy a place in an area where she will have more customer demand.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like stuffed animals, decorative cups, and artificial flowers.

loans.name: Yessica Maria

texts.es:
Yessica vive en Ica, Perú. Ica se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente. En su tiempo libre disfruta pasear y visitar a su familia;  como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que le gusta mucho a Yessica  es el “arroz con pollo”; Yessica estudió hasta quinto año de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser profesora. Ella es conviviente y su esposo labora como Maestro constructor, juntos tienen 2  hijos cuyas edades comprenden  7 y 11 años los cuales cursan estudios primarios.
	
"yessica trabaja en la venta de huevos, se dedica a este trabajo 6 diarias y puede atender hasta 10 clientes, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque ofrece productos de calidad y brinda una buena atención a sus clientes.

Actualmente Yessica está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería, lo que le permitirá tener más productos para vender  y aumentar sus ingresos y así seguir trabajando para cumplir  su gran sueño: “Terminar de construir su casa."
texts.en:
Yessica lives in Ica, Peru. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the capital of the country and is acclaimed by Peruvians as “The Land of the Sun.” It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (a 8.0 in 2007 and a 6.9 in 2011), its production of grapes, asparagus and olives and perhaps above all as the source of the traditional Peruvian drink, Pisco.

We find the client’s house and business in this hot, arid climate. In her spare time she enjoys going to visit her family. As is well known, Peru is characterized as having the most delicious food in the world and one of the dishes that Yessica enjoys a great deal is “arroz con pollo” (rice with chicken). She has studied until the fifth year of secondary school and would have liked to study to be a teacher. She lives with her partner who works as a master builder. They have two children, who are 7 and 11, both of whom are in primary school.

Yesica sells eggs and works 6 days a week, tending to up to 10 customers. She feels her business is going well because she offers a high quality product and provides good customer service.

Currently, Yessica is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, she will be able to purchase more merchandise, which will enable her to have more products to sell. Thus she will increase her income and be able to continue working to fulfill her great dream: to finish building her house.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise (eggs, wholesale).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy t-shirts, blouses, caps, shorts and other products

loans.name: Bayansaikhan

texts.en:
Bayansaikhan is a 40-year-old widow who lives with her two sons and two daughters, aged between 1 and 21. The family lives in an apartment in Mongolia's capital, Ulaanbaatar.  Bayansaikhan's oldest son works as a dancer in the countryside while her youngest son and oldest daughter attend public school. Bayansaikhan’s mother is retired and cares for Bayansaikhan’s youngest daughter.

Bayansaikhan supports her children by operating two retail stalls at the largest outdoor market in Mongolia. She has 3,000,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) in working capital. She is applying for a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to purchase more products from Ereen, the border city of China. She is a trusted and repeat client, and this is her second time borrowing through Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase more television antennas and telecontrols.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria tiene 41 años, está casada y tiene 3 hijos. Es comerciante desde hace más de 10 años, comenta que se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo y temporada.
Empezó vendiendo primeramente en forma ambulante, con el pequeño ahorro y la ayuda de su marido que es empleado de una empresa embazadora de gaseosas, pudo formar su micro-comercio e instalarlo en su casa. Gracias a la buena atención y la buenísima calidad de sus prendas, hoy día tiene una clientela formada.
La Sra. Maria solicita el crédito para la compra de bermudas, jeans, remeras, que son las prendas con más demandas en esta época del año. Ña Maria desde ya agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya y Kiva por el apoyo y la confianza que le otorgan.
texts.en:
Maria is 41 years old, married, and has three children.  She has been buying and selling goods for more than ten years.  She tells us that she sells all kinds of clothing for all seasons.

Maria started out making her sales as an itinerant vendor.  She used a small amount of savings and the help of her husband, who is an employee in a soda packaging company, to set up her micro-business in her own home.  Thanks to her good customer service and the really good quality of the clothing she sells, she now has an established customer base.

Maria is requesting this loan to buy Bermuda shorts, jeans and t-shirts which are in most demand at this time of year.  Maria is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for their support and for the trust that they are placing in her.

loans.use: to buy Bermuda shorts, jeans, t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian lives in Yei. She sells fish, and has been in business for seven years. She is thirty-six years old, married, and has four children; two of them are still in school. 

Vivian heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a concrete house in future.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is a mother of three children living in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Jasmin used her last loan to purchase motor tires and accessories for her transportation business. Her business grew and become successful. 

Now, she's taking a new loan for her retail store to purchase additional products to sell. She is positive and hopes to be able to grow her business further.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Evangelyn

texts.en:
Evangelyn is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with six children.

Evangelyn has a business of providing motorela or motorcycle services, with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy tools and to pay for gasoline for the transportation services.

Evangelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline for her transportation services.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon still owns an electronics shop, a business she has been operating for the past year. She is doing great. 

This is her second business loan from KADET Ltd., to finance her business. She plans to purchase more bulbs, electrical wires and sockets. 

She will use the anticipated profits to add more stock and repay her loan. She hopes to have a solid business.

loans.use: to purchase more bulbs, electrical wires and sockets.

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гульчехра – женщина 43 лет, замужем, имеет троих детей. Она торгует на вещевом рынке мужской одеждой. Муж работает штукатуром отдельщиком домов. Товар привозит из Бишкека сама, раз в месяц, смотря на продвижение товара. На очередной кредит она хочет привезти весенний ассортимент мужских рубашек. Она при первом получении кредита смогла разнообразить зимний ассортимент товаров, и под Новый год смогла получить хорошую прибыль, которую потратила на праздничные расходы.
texts.en: Gulchehra is a 43 year-old married woman with three children.  She sells men's clothing at a clothing market.  Her husband works as plasterer and decorator of homes.  Gulchehra brings in merchandise from Bishkek by herself once per month, depending on merchandise sales volumes.  She wants to use this loan to bring in a spring selection of men's shirts.  Gulchehra was able to vary her winter merchandise selection with her first loan and made a good profit prior to the New Year's holiday, which she spent on holiday expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a spring selection of men's shirts

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El Sr. Pedro es de ciudad del Este, está casado tiene 5 hijos,  todos aun en edad escolar, que dependen de él. Pedro se dedica a la venta de ropas,  en el centro de Ciudad Del Este, cuya venta le genera  un buen ingreso.
Con la ayuda de su esposa y toda la familia están  saliendo adelante con mucho sacrificio y dedicación.
Hoy día el es una microempresario exitoso con  mucha  clientela, debido a su buen trato y a la buena calidad de los productos que vende. Ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y honesta en sus compromisos por lo que debemos brindarle todo el apoyo necesario.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, con lo que podrá surtir su negocio y ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Pedro is from Ciudad del Este.  He is married and has five children who are all still school age and dependent on him.  Pedro's business is selling clothes in the center of Ciudad del Este.  His sales make him a good income.

With the help of his wife and his whole family, Pedro is managing to get ahead in life with a lot of sacrifice and commitment.

Pedro is now a successful micro-businessman with a lot of customers as a result of the good customer service that he provides and the good quality of the products that he sells.  He has shown himself to be a responsible and honest person as regards his obligations and so we must give him all the support he needs.

Pedro is requesting this loan to buy summer clothing which he will use to stock his business.  This will enable him to offer his customers a wider variety of garments.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: La Sra. Esperanza se dedica a la venta de papa en la localidad de Quillacollo ya hace bastantes  años, trabaja con la ayuda de su esposo, quien es transportista y le ayuda con el traslado de sus productos al mercado donde tiene su puesto de venta, cabe recalcar que  tiene un impecable record de pagos, cuenta con domicilio propio en la zona de Pocpocollo, necesita el crédito para la compra de papa por quintales para poder venderlos ya por menor y así de este modo incrementar su capital de trabajo y por ende mejorar sus ingresos, es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Esperanza's business is selling potatoes in the town of Quillacollo.  She has been in this business for quite a few years.  She works with the help of her husband who is a truck driver.  He transports her products to the market where she has her sales stall.  We must emphasize that Esperanza has an impeccable repayment record and owns her own home in Pocpocollo district.  She needs this loan to buy potatoes by the 100lb sack so that she can sell them retail and thereby increase her working capital and improve her income.  She is a very hard-working person and she feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support that they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy potatoes by the 100lb sack

loans.name: Cecilio

texts.es:
El señor Cecilio es de la ciudad de Santaní, hace más de 5 años que está trabajando por si solo en un taller mecánico junto a un socio.
Don Cecilio comento que los trabajos han aumentado en los últimos tiempos, y que por ello solicito el crédito para compra de herramientas y levantar un pequeño tinglado de tal modo a ofrecer mejor servicio a sus clientes.
El es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza siempre al máximo para poder salir adelante y progresar, y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo y poder dar fuente de trabajo a otras personas.
texts.en:
Señor Cecilio is from the city of Santaní. He has worked for himself in a garage, with one partner, for over five years.
Cecilio tells us that he has had more work lately, and for this reason he has requested a loan for the purchase of tools and to set up a small shed in order to offer a better service to his customers.
He is a very hard-working person, who always does his very best to succeed and get ahead. This is how he is able to help his family. His goal is to be able to keep growing and to provide other people with employment.

loans.use: to buy tools for his garage.

loans.name: Vidalia

texts.es:
Vidalia es de la ciudad de Santaní. Vive con sus padres en su humilde casa de dicha ciudad. Se dedica a la venta de bebidas, golosinas, chipas, etc. en un copetín ubicado frente mismo a su casa en donde pasajeros de los colectivos y sus mismos vecinos son los principales consumidores.
Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora que se esfuerza al máximo siempre para poder ayudar a sus familiares, ya que quiere darles lo mejor, para que no tengan que pasar por privaciones.
Solicito el crédito para comprar bebidas, golosinas y demás insumos que tienen mayor salida, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener más variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Vidalia is from the city of Santaní, where she lives with her parents in a small home. She sells drinks, candy, chips, etc. in a small stall in front of her home. Bus passengers and her neighbours are her main customers.
She is a hard-working and enterprising woman who always does her very best to help her family, because she wants to give them the best so that they never lack anything.
She requested this loan for the purchase of drinks, candy, and other popular products. This way, she will be able to stock up and have a greater variety of products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy drinks, candy, and other supplies.

loans.name: Santos  Mateo

texts.es:
En el Sauce un bello municipio del departamento de León con muchos potenciales en lo que respecta la ganadería, santos mateo  es conocido como una persona responsable, trabajador  su actividad es  compra de novillos, los repasta y luego lo saca al matadero, es de esta forma que obtiene sus propios ingresos para el desarrollo de su familia.  
 
 Actualmente se presentó a Ceprodel   con   el fin de solicitar un crédito para la compra de Novillos para la crianza y desarrollo, ya que esto le servirá de mucho beneficio en poder llegar a trabajar con un mejor capital disponible en lo  ganadero y poder incrementar su producción, así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos Mateo is known as a responsible, hard-working person in El Sauce. El Sauce is a beautiful municipality in the department of Leon with great opportunities for working with livestock. Santos Mateo buys young bulls, grazes them, and then brings them to the slaughter. This is how he makes an income for his family.
He has come to Ceprodel with the goal of getting a loan for the purchase of young bulls to raise. This will be a great help to him so that he can work with more capital and increase his production. This will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a young bull.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
En el municipio del Sauce, Natividad  es conocido como una persona dedicada a la ganadería y agricultura  donde se ha caracterizado por ser muy buen trabajador debido a que ha sabido manejar las condiciones de su Finca y la de su familia. Este cliente cuenta con un hijo bajo su cargo, se dedica principalmente a la ganadería, cuenta con su propio inventario ganadero, donde produce leche, y todos sus derivados donde la saca al mercado, principalmente se dedica al engorde de novillos para luego sacarlo al mercado.  
 
 Actualmente se presentó a Ceprodel, con   el fin de solicitar un crédito para la compra de un ternero para desarrollo, ya que esto le servirá de mucho beneficio en poder llegar a obtener mejores ingreso y de esta forma poder vivir en mejores condiciones con su familia
texts.en:
In the town of Sauce, Natividad is well known as a cattle rancher and farmer.  He is noted for being a very good worker because he has known how to manage his farm and support his family.  This client has one child in his care.  His main business is raising cattle.  He owns his own cows who produce milk and derivative products which he sells on the market.   His main business, however, is fattening young bulls which he then sells.

Natividad came to Ceprodel to request a loan to buy a calf to raise.  This will help enable him to make better income and live in better conditions together with his family.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Pavlik

texts.en: Pavlik is from the village of Shirak in the Shirak region of Armenia.  He is married with three children: two daughters (ages twenty-two and twenty-four) and a sixteen-year-old son.  He has a high school education and has been farming for the past twenty years.  He considers himself a hardworking person.  Pavlik dreams of saving enough money to help purchase homes for his children.  He is looking for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel.  He expects this investment to increase the family income by twenty-five percent.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
La Sr  Jose es de Ciudad del Este, tiene una despensa con muy buena clientela, la cual ha levantado y mantenido con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio.
Con el apoyo de su familia, trabajo en equipo y cooperación entre todos, se puede ver el crecimiento y progreso en el cual se están desenvolviendo. Ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y honesta en sus compromisos dignos de nuestro apoyo
El solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, enlatados, azúcar, fideos, arroz, y demás insumos de primera necesidad, con lo cual podrá mantener surtido su negocio.
texts.en:
Jose is from Ciudad del Este. He has a small grocery store with a good clientele, which he has built and kept going with much effort and sacrifice.

With his family's support, teamwork, and everyone's cooperation, one can see the growth and progress in which they are developing. He has shown himself to be a responsible, honest person in his commitments, and worthy of our support.

He is applying for the loan to buy food products, canned goods, sugar, noodles, rice, and other household necessities, with which he will be able to to keep his business stocked.

loans.use: To buy food products, canned goods, sugar, noodles, rice, and other supplies.

loans.name: Elsa Cristina

texts.es: Elsa Cristina de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive con su familia en una zona muy concurrida de personas. Ella posee una venta de productos de uso personal, ropa y calzado; se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable; Elsa es una mujer muy trabajadora con muchas ganas de superarse, su más grande secreto para llegar al éxito es la constancia en su labor, quiere ver crecer su negocio y mantenerse adelante de su competencia, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un  que le permita comprar cremas, perfumes, shampoo, jabones, cosméticos entre otros. Elsa Cristina tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa Cristina is 34 years old and lives with her family in a densely populated area.  She has a shop where she sells personal products, clothes and shoes.  She has had many customers lately, since all that she sells is of high quality, and she offers very affordable prices.   Further, her customer service is outstanding.

She is a very hardworking woman with a lot of ambition.  Her greatest secret for her success is to consistently work hard.  She wants to see her business grow and keep improving her own skills.  For these reasons, she decided to seek a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable her to buy creams, perfumes, shampoo, soap, cosmetics and other items.  She is confident that this will allow her to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy creams, perfumes, shampoo, soap, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Lagmentaaba Group

texts.fr:
Mme ZOENABO est la représentante du groupe LAGMENTAABA. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 08ans le moins âgé a 1an. 01 de ses enfants vont a l’école et elle a 04 personnes à sa charge.

Mme est tisseuse. Elle exerce ce métier depuis 04ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de cissin. Ses clients sont les femmes, hommes et amis.

Mme veut  s’acheter  01 balle de fils de tisse, 06kg de teinture, 01 barrique d’eau et un peu de bois.

Elle  s’occupe de la scolarité de ses enfants  et épargne un peu ses bénéfices. Mme ambitionne  ouvrir un atelier de tissage.
texts.en:
Zoenabo is the leader of the Lagmentaaba group. She is married and has three children. The eldest child is eight years old and the youngest is one, and  one of the children is in school. Zoenabo has four people to support.

Zoenabo is a weaver, and has been working in this profession for four years. She buys her supplies at the market in Cissin. Her customers include both women and men, and friends.

She would like to buy 1 ball of yarn for weaving, 6kg of dye, 1 barrel of water and some wood.

She uses her income to pay for her children's schooling, and also saves some money. She hopes to open a weaving workshop.

loans.use: to buy 1 ball of yarn for weaving, 6kg of dye, 1 barrel of water and some wood.

loans.name: Garegin

texts.en: Garegin is from the village of Jajur in the Shirak region of Armenia.  He is married with three children: a twenty-four-year-old daughter and two sons (ages twenty-four and twenty-five).  He has supported his family with his hard work over the past twenty years as a farmer.  He would like to increase his savings to open a small shop in the village.  Garegin requests a loan to purchase livestock and feed.  This small investment will increase his family's income by thirty percent.  He is pleased with microfinance services and enjoys living in Jajur, surrounded by his relatives and friends.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and feed.

loans.name: Carmen Susana

texts.es:
Carmen es una mujer de 27 años, se destaca por ser una persona amigable, sencilla, honesta, muy trabajadora y responsable con sus tres hijos. Carmen es soltera, vive con su madre y sus hijos en Atuntaqui que se encuentra a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Carmen trabaja con su madre en la crianza de animales como pollos, conejos, cuyes, cerdos. A estado realizando créditos en Fodemi por un tiempo de tres años, el actual crédito que solicita es para la mejorar la infraestructura de los galpones y corrales de sus animales ya que necesitan espacio para vivir, también necesita comprar balanceado para la alimentación de los mismo debido a que necesita engordarles para su posterior venta. Esta inversión ayudará a Carmen a incrementar su negocio y sus animales puedan ser optimos para las ventas lo que generará muy buenos ingresos, que ayudarán a Carmen y su madre a mantener su hogar ya que es el único ingreso económico.

Carmen sueña con seguir estudiando y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 27-year-old woman who is noted for being a friendly, unassuming, honest, very hard-working person who is responsible in providing for her three children.  Carmen is single and she lives with her mother and children in Atuntaqui, 15 minutes from the city of Ibarra, in Imbabura province.

Carmen works alongside her mother raising animals such as chickens, rabbits, guinea pigs and pigs.  She has been taking out loans with Fodemi for three years.  She is requesting her current loan to improve the infrastructure of her chicken sheds and animal pens because the animals need space in which to live.  She also needs to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for them as she needs to fatten them and then sell them.  This investment will help Carmen to increase her business and her animals will be in an ideal condition for sale which will make her very good income.  This will help Carmen and her mother to support their household as this is their only income.

Carmen dreams of continuing her studies and improving her children's quality of life.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of her chicken sheds and animal pens, and to buy nutritionally-balanced feed with which to fatten her animals

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan Antonio de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; el posee un taller donde repara aparatos electrónicos televisores, grabadoras entre otros, es muy conocido en el lugar y debido a esto también aumento la demanda por sus servicios, ya que su trabajo es de excelente calidad y a precio muy accesible, además el servicio es inigualable; Juan es un hombre muy entregado a su labor, honrado y siempre dispuesto a superarse a sí mismo, piensa que por muy duro que sea el camino que hay que recorrer, al final siempre está la puerta a la felicidad y el éxito, está muy decidido a cumplir sus sueños es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar suministros para el taller, repuestos, herramientas etc. Juan Antonio tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan Antonio is 52 years old and lives together with his life partner.  He owns a workshop where he repairs electronic appliances, television sets, recorders etc.  He is very well known in his area and, as a result, the demand for his services has risen.  His work is top quality, he charges affordable prices and his service is second to none.  Juan is a man who is very committed to his work.  He is honest and always ready to improve himself.  He believes that no matter how hard the path is that we have to follow, at the end the door to happiness and success is always there.  Juan is very determined to fulfill his dreams and he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow him to buy supplies for his workshop, spare parts, tools, etc.  Juan Antonio believes that this will enable him to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his workshop, spare parts and tools

loans.name: Martin

texts.en: Martin lives in the Shirak region of Armenia, in the village of Hovouny.  His close friends and relatives also live in Hovouny.  It is a good place to be a farmer.  Martin is happily married with three children: two daughters (ages twenty-one and twenty-seven) and a twenty-four-year-old son.  He also supports his older daughter's family.  Martin would like a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel.  With this investment, he expects the family income to increase by twenty percent.  He is looking to reinvest his earnings in the family business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel.

loans.name: José Elías

texts.es:
El señor José Elías es originario de una comarca del municipio de El Sauce, tiene muchos años de dedicarse al comercio, su negocio consiste en brindar servicio de un molino a la población de este caserío.

El y su esposa son unas personas luchadoras que han enseñado a sus hijos a valerse por sí solos y ser personas de bien y honestas.

Con los pequeños créditos que le ha otorgado Ceprodel han agrandado su negocio donde hoy en la actualidad tienen dos molinos cuando al inicio empezaron con uno pequeño, por lo que trabaja en conjunto con su esposa para poder dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Gracias a la utilidad que obtienen han mejorado su calidad de vida porque tienen mejores condiciones de vida en su hogar. En estos momentos tiene la necesidad de adquirir un préstamo para comprar frijoles, diesel, grasa y banda con el fin de darles un mejor mantenimiento a sus equipos para no fallar en la labor diaria que brinda a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señor José Elías is a native of a region in the El Sauce municipality. He has many years of experience working in his trade. His business involves providing milling services to the people in the hamlet.

He and his wife are fighters who have taught their children to look after themselves well and be good and honest people.

With the small loans that Ceprodel have granted to him, he has extended his business so that today there are two mills, whereas in the beginning he started with one small mill. He therefore works together with his wife to provide his customers with better service.

Thanks to the profits that they have earned, they have improved their quality of life as they enjoy better living conditions in their home. At this time he needs to obtain a loan to buy food, diesel, oil and a conveyor belt, with the intention of carrying out better maintenance on his equipment to avoid missing out on any of the daily jobs that his customers provide him with.

loans.use: to buy food, diesel, oil and a conveyor belt

loans.name: Fabian Armando

texts.es:
Fabian es una persona trabajadora, emprendedora y con deseos de salir adelante día a día por el bienestar de su hijo y de sus esposa. Vive con su familia en Otavalo en la provincia de Imbabura.

Fabián tiene una tienda de venta de víveres, trabaja con Fodemi cerca de 10 años, el crédito que solicitó actualmente invertirá en la compra de productos para su tienda como quintales de sal, quintales de azúcar, quintales de arroz, refrescos, snaks, esto para dar una buena atención al cliente y que su tienda sea muy conocida en el sector. Esta invresión ayudará a Fabián a obtener nueva clientela y buenos ingresos que ayudaran a sustentar los gastos de su familia.

El sueño de Fabián es poder tener un micromercado y buscar nuevas alternativas para generar buenos ingresos para dar el estudio a su hijo y mantener a su esposa.
texts.en:
Fabian is a hard-working, enterprising person, who wants to move forward day by day, for the well-being of his son and his wife. He and his family live in Otavalo, in Imbabura province.

Fabian has a grocery store, and has been working with Fodemi for ten years. The loan he has applied for now, he will use to buy products for his store such as hundred-pound quantities of salt, sugar and rice, as well as soft drinks and snacks. 

This is to give good service to the customer, and so that his store will be well-known in the area. This investment will help Fabian get new customers and good income, which will help him support his family's household expenses.

Fabian's dream is to be able to have a mini-mart, and look for new alternatives for generating good income, in order to pay for his son's schooling and support his wife.

loans.use: To add to the products in his store; with hundred-pound quantities of salt, sugar and rice, as well as soft drinks and snacks.

loans.name: Arpine

texts.en: Arpine is from the village of Hovouny in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with a thirteen-year-old son.  She has a high school education and has been farming for the past ten years.  Arpine also helps support her husband’s aunt who lives alone.  She is looking for a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.  According to her business plan, this investment will increase the family income by twenty-five percent.  Her personal plan is to save enough money for her son’s university education.  Arpine is also intent to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy general food supplies.

loans.name: Flor Kantuta Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR KANTUTA” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Fortunata. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: hilado de lana vicuña, cría de gallina y chanchos, costura de camperas, producción de leche, tienda de barrio, trenzado de mantas.

La señora Fortunata,  indica que hace mas de seis ciclos que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de la promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de sus familiares.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de leche) que elaborará en su lechería  y posteriormente lo venderá a la empresa. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta área de salud.
texts.en:
The 'Flor Kantuta' community bank are about to start their second loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Collpani regional office.  The group has eight members and is run by a board of directors which is headed by Fortunata.  The businesses that the members of the bank are engaged in are varied and include: spinning vicuña wool, raising hens and pigs, sewing jackets, processing milk, running a neighborhood store and weaving blankets.

Fortunata says that she has been working with Pro Mujer for more than six loan cycles and that she joined through an invitation from a loan officer.  She currently has a business selling milk which she has been working in for years.  She learned the business from her family members.

Fortunata is requesting this loan to increase her capital (buying milk) which she will process in her dairy and then sell to a company.  This work enables her to make income with which to support her family.  Fortunata is married and has two children.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Fortunata replied that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to buy milk

loans.name: Noel Perpetuo

texts.es:
En el municipio del Sauce, El señor Noel Perpetuo   se ha caracterizado por ser un  buen trabajador dedicado a su familia, amante de la labor que realiza, ha sabido manejar su condición de vida,  casado con tres hijos bajo su cargo, se dedica principalmente a la ganadería, cuenta con su propio inventario ganadero, donde produce leche y la saca al mercado. 
 
 Actualmente se presentó a Ceprodel  con   el fin de solicitar un crédito,  para la compra de un toro semental,  ya que esto le será de  muchos  beneficios en su inventario ganadero, y podrá  incrementar su producción de lácteos y de esta forma obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
In the town of El Sauce, Noel Perpetuo is known as being a good worker who is devoted to his family.  He loves the work that he does and has been able to support himself from it.  He is married and has three children in his care.  His main business is raising cattle.  He owns his own cattle who produce milk which he sells on the market.

Noel Perpetuo came to Ceprodel to request a loan so that he could buy a stud bull.  This will be a great addition to his cattle inventory as he will be able to increase his production of dairy products and make better income.

loans.use: to buy a stud bull

loans.name: Marine

texts.en: Marine is from the village of Arevshat in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is the proud mother of four children: two daughters (ages fourteen and twenty-one) and two sons (ages seventeen and eighteen).  Together with her husband, Marine has been farming for the past fifteen years.  She also helps support relatives living in the city with produce grown on the family farm.  Marine is looking for a loan to purchase calves and animal feed.  She expects this investment to increase her income by twenty percent.  She dreams of all her children being happily married and looks forward to becoming a grandmother.

loans.use: to purchase calves and animal feed.

loans.name: Davit

texts.en: Davit lives in the village of Arevshat in the Shirak region of Armenia.  The name of the village means “lots of sun”.  He is married with three children: two daughters (ages eight and twelve) and a six-year-old son.  Agriculture is the way of life in Arevshat, and Davit has been farming for over eighteen years.  In order to expand his business, he would like a loan to purchase feed and calves.  Davit is going to save some of the proceeds from this investment to reconstruct his cattle shed.  This loan will help increase the family income by around twenty percent.  He is pleased with microfinance services, especially that repayments are organized in his village.

loans.use: to purchase calves and feed.

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is a married woman. She has five children, four of whom are enrolled in school.

Mwanasha operates a fish selling business and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are passersby and neighbors. Mwanasha's other source of income includes her husband's earning. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expense is food and school fees. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water.

Mwanasha will use the loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase a refrigerator for storing fish. She aspires to become a wholesale supplier of fish in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for storing fish.

loans.name: José Ángel

texts.es:
José Ángel de 52 años de edad, es casado desde hace 18 años, con dos hijos de 19 y 16 años, vive en el Barrio Santa Barbará, Taulabe.
Quien desde hace 20 años se dedica a vender medicina como pastillas de toda clase, para el dolor, resfriados etc. De acuerdo a pedidos, el surte pulperías y también vende en su casa, son productos que generan buenas ganancias a corto plazo porque es venta al contado.
Esta solicitando 11,000 lempiras y es su primer préstamo con ODEF, el cual lo invertirá en medicamentos como pastillas de toda clase como panadol, musflex, tabcin, antigripales, antiarreicos, desparacitantes etc. Para tener siempre en existencia y cumplir con los pedidos.
Su mete es graduar a su hijo de la universidad y comprar una motocicleta para desplazarse mas fácil a vender los productos.
texts.en:
José Ángel, age 52, has been married for 18 years.  He has two children, ages 19 and 16.  He lives in the Santa Barbará neighborhood in Taulabe.

He has been selling medicine for 20 years.  He sells all types of pills like for pain and for colds, etc.  According to his orders he supplies general stores, and he also sells at his house.  These products generate good income in the short term because they are sold for cash.

He is requesting 11,000 lempiras.  This is his first loan with ODEF.  He will use it to buy medications, all types of pills like “Panadol, Musflex, Tabcin” (brand name medications), antivirals, arthritis medication, and deworming medication, etc.  He will do this to always have them on hand and to fill his orders.

His goal is for his son to graduate from the university and to buy a motorcycle in order to get around more easily to sell his products.

loans.use: to buy medications like “Panadol, Musflex, Tabcin” (brand name medications), antivirals, arthritis medication, and deworming medication, etc.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
El señor Isidro, tiene 39 años de edad proviene de una familia humilde y de escasos recursos económicos, razón   por la cual cuenta con terrenos agrícolas muy pequeñas, vive en la comunidad de Collpa Pampa del municipio de Mizque del departamento de Cochabamba. Su principal actividad es la agricultura, produce desde más de 20 años  Papa, Frejol y Cebolla; su producto vende   a los comerciantes de la   población de Tin Tin. Al  señor Isidro lo conocen como  una persona muy responsable y trabajador  en su comunidad por la dedicación a su trabajo y por ser el responsable de la educación  de sus hijos y el bienestar de su familia. 
El señor Isidro está solicitando el presente crédito para comprar más semillas de Papa, Frejol, cebolla, Abono químico, Abono orgánico y agroquímicos; y de esta forma aumentar y mejorar la calidad de su producción y por lo tanto tener más ingresos y mejorar el de vida toda su familia.
texts.en:
Isidro is 39 years old and comes from a humble family with scarce economic resources.   For this reason he has a very little land on which to farm.  He lives in the community of Collpa Pampa in the municipality of Mizque in the department of Cochabamba.  His main economic activity is farming; for over 20 years he has grown potatoes, beans and onions.  He sells his produce to vendors in Tin Tin.  He is known as a very responsible and hardworking person in his community.  He is also recognized as being very dedicated to the education of his children and the well-being of his family.

He is seeking the present loan for the purchase of more seed potatoes, beans, onion seeds, chemical and organic compost, and other necessary chemicals.  In this manner he will be able to increase his harvests and improve the quality of his crops, leading to greater income which will allow him to provide a better life for everyone in his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, organic compost, and chemicals.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de sesenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su familia, el posee una venta de maíz y maicillo, es muy conocido en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente francisco siempre recibe a las personas con una sonrisa en el rostro; es un hombre muy trabajador dedicado al cien por ciento a lo que realiza piensa que entre más duro trabaje más grande será la recompensa, está dispuesto a ver crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz y maicillo por mayor. Francisco tiene la esperanza que así podrá llevar a su hogar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Francisco is 65 and lives with his family. He has a small business selling corn and sorghum. He is very well-known in the area, and has acquired a lot of customers, as what he sells is top-quality and affordable. In addition, the service is excellent. 

Francisco always greets people with a smile on his face. He is a very hard-working man, 100% dedicated to what he does. He believes that the harder you work, the greater the reward. He is ready to see his business grow, and this is why he is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn and sorghum at wholesale. 

Francisco hopes that in this way, he will be able to provide his household with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn and sorghum at wholesale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a married woman. She has four children with ages ranging from thirty-four to forty-two. She describes herself as an ambitious woman. Previously, she was involved in greengrocery activity. She operates a dairy farm where she sells milk. She has been involved in this business for sixteen years. Her business is located near a busy market and her primary customers are a limited cooperative society. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of cow food. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy a cow. Mary's  business goal is to increase the cows size to thirty within five years.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Zile Ywan Group

texts.fr:
Mme AMINATA  est la représentante du groupe ZILE YWAN. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Le plus âgé a 39ans le moins âgé a 17ans. 03 de ses enfants vont à l’école et elle a 09 personnes à sa charge.

Mme vend des ignames. Elle exerce ce métier depuis 35ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Léo au BURKINA. Ses clients sont les femmes et hommes.

Mme veut  s’acheter  03 calebasses d’ignames.

Elle épargne ses bénéfices et s’occupe de la scolarité de ses enfants. Mme ambitionne  ouvrir un grand magasin.
texts.en:
Aminata is the head of the Zile Ywan group. She is married and the mother of seven. The eldest is 39 years old and the youngest is 17, and three of the children go to school. Aminata supports nine people.

Aminata sells yams and has been doing this work for 35 years. She buys supplies at Léo in Burkina Faso. Her customers are men and women. 

Aminata would like to buy 3 calabashes of yams. She saves her earnings and uses them to pay her children's school fees. She hopes to open a large shop.

loans.use: to buy 3 calabashes of yams.

loans.name: Knarik

texts.en: Knarik lives in the village of Shirakavan in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is widowed with two children: a thirty-year-old daughter and a thirty-nine-year-old son.  She is a hardworking, honest person who has been farming for the past twenty years.  In addition to supporting herself, she also helps her children with produce grown on the family farm.  She would like to save some extra money to repair the cattle shed.  Knarik is looking for a loan to purchase cows and animal feed.  She expects this investment to increase her income by twenty-five percent.  She enjoys the village life and has many good neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase cows and animal feed.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es:
El joven Freddy actualmente se esfuerza trabajando para mantener a sus 4 hijos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para útiles escolares y pago de universidad de sus 4 queridísimos hijos los cuales lo requieren de inmediato puesto que es un requisito para continuar en la universidad.  

Se presentó a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de útiles escolares tales como mochilas, cuadernos, compra de una computadora y pago de universidad. Está consciente que Ceprodel apoya a este tipo de personas y espera que dicho crédito sea otorgado para así sacar a delante a sus 4 hijos que tanto ama.
texts.en:
Freddy is currently working hard to support his four children.  He is in need of a loan for school supplies and university tuition for his four beloved children.  A payment is due immediately to be able to continue at the university.

He came to Ceprodel to seek a loan for school supplies such as backpacks, notebooks and a computer, as well as for university tuition.  He is aware that Ceprodel supports people in these areas and hopes that this loan will allow him to provide a better life for his four children that he loves so much.

loans.use: to buy school supplies such as backpacks, notebooks and a computer, as well as for university tuition.

loans.name: Manvel

texts.en: Manvel is from the village of Isahakyan in the Shirak region of Armenia.  He is married with two children: a six-year-old daughter and a three-year-old son.  He has a high school education and has been farming for around twenty years.  He was born in Isahakyan and has lived there his whole life.  The conditions in Isahakyan are fine for agriculture.  Manvel would like a loan to purchase livestock, seeds and fuel.  According to his plan, this investment will increase the family income by twenty percent.  He is glad that the loan repayment process is organized in his village.  He hopes to continue growing his business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock, seeds and fuel.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman. She has five children, two of whom are enrolled in school. Mariam operates a food stall business and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for ten years. Her primary customers are passersby and neighbours. Mariam's other source of income includes her husband's earnings. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expense is food and school fees. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Mariam will use the KES 40,000 loan to repair her business stall, purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and cooking oil. Mariam aspires to establish a restaurant business in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to repair her business stall, purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and cooking oil.

loans.name: Quan

texts.en:
Quan is forty-six years old and single. Quan lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. For twenty years she has operated a food stall selling bread and pork to people in their community.

Quan would like a loan to purchase good quality pork and bread at competitive prices from wholesalers. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: To purchase good quality pork and bread to sell.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is a forty-four year old woman. She has a daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a bricklayer. 

Thuy has been running a business selling clothing for eighteen years. She would like to take loan to buy a greater quantity and variety of clothes to sell. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that through the loan her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater quantity and variety of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 48 years old and married. She and her husband Peter are blessed with five children ages 23, 22, 13, 10, and 7 years. She sells different types of cloth materials, a business she has been doing for 5 years. She earns a monthly income of 50,000 Kenya shillings (KES).

Jane has requested a loan of KES 30,000 to buy different types of clothes for sale. The profit she earns will help her complete building rental houses as well as establish a reputable business.

Her dream is to start a reputable business and ensure that her family is comfortable. This is her first loan.

loans.use: to buy different types of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Hang

texts.en:
Hang, forty-eight, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband supports their family by working as a driver.

Hang has been running a general store for thirteen years. She sells biscuits, sugar, soft drinks, yogurt and other household items to people in her community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products, in particular confectionery and beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and send her children to school.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of products, in particular confectionery and beverages, to stock her store.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is twenty-eight years of age, married to Charles, and blessed with three children aged thirteen, eleven and nine. She owns a carpentry workshop as well as a grocery store a business she started eight years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 28,800. 

She has requested a loan worth KES 60,000 to purchase timber, fibers, foam, velvet cement and boards. The anticipated profit will help her venture into other businesses such as tailoring.

Rose's dream is to be an employer, this is her third loan.

loans.use: To purchase timber, fibre, foam, velvet cement and boards.

loans.name: Brigitta

texts.en:
Brigitta is a married woman. She has five children, three of them are enrolled in school. Brigitta operates a poultry business and sells her goods from home. She's worked in this business for five years. Her primary customers are neighbours and passersby. She describes her greatest business challenge to be diseases and her highest monthly expense is food and school fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Brigitta will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase chicken feeds including layer marsh and broiler starter (types of chicken feed). Brigitta aspires to incorporate another business of keeping dairy cows in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase chicken feed including layer marsh and broiler starter.

loans.name: Manushak

texts.en: Manushak is from the village of Karnout in the Shirak region of Armenia.  She is married with two sons, ages nineteen and twenty-four.  She is a community college graduate and has been farming for over twenty years.  She is a hard worker and provides extra support to her younger son who is in the army.  She dreams of renovating the family home, but first she is looking to grow her business.  Manushak would like a loan to purchase seeds, fuel and calves.  This investment should increase the family income be around thirty percent.  She is pleased with the terms and conditions of microfinance.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fuel and calves.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is a forty-two-year-old woman. She make money by sewing clothes at home and she has done this for nine years. Her husband works as a driver. They have three sons and one daughter. They live together in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Thuy would like to take out a loan to buy sewing materials, fabrics and repair her sewing machine. This will increase her productive capacity and allow her to create a larger amount of clothing. She hopes that this will enable her to increase her income and set aside some savings for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials, fabrics and repair her sewing machine.

loans.name: Phung

texts.en:
Phung is a 40-year-old married woman living in Ho Chi Minh City. She has two children: one daughter and one son. 

Phung earns a living running a general store, which she has done for 14 years. She would like to take a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as milk, soft drinks, snack foods, and confectionery, to stock her store. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that through the loan her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to save money to meet any future difficulties.

loans.use: To buy basic goods to stock her store.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret lives in Yei. She sells food from a stall, and has been in business for one year. She is thirty-five years old, married, and has three children; all of them are still in school. 

Margret heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 800 SDG in order to purchase beans and onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a concrete house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase beans and onions to sell.

loans.name: Nhung

texts.en:
Nhung is a thirty-nine-year-old woman with two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City and makes money by running a general store in front of her house.
